long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy Bluesky, but miss keyboard shortcuts? This extension adds familiar keyboard navigation to enhance your Bluesky experience!

Available shortcuts:

j - Move down
k - Move up
l - Like post
r - Reply
t - Repost (press again to undo)
Shift + t - Quote post
o - Expand image
Enter - Open post
. - Load more posts
c - Cycle forward through saved feeds
Shift + c - Cycle backward through saved feeds
/ - Focus search
h - Hide post
b - Block account
x - Report post
y - Copy post text
t - Translate post
g h - Go to home
g p - Go to profile
g u - Go to post author profile
g n - Go to notifications
g c - Go to chat
g f - Go to feeds
g l - Go to lists
g s - Go to settings
? - Show shortcuts menu
